mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_NO FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY PRODUCT_NO DESC) AS RN, PRODUCT_NO FROM PRODUCT WHERE SELLER_NO = #{sellerNo}) WHERE RN = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT( PRODUCT_NO ,SELLER_NO ,BUYER_NO ,CATEGORY_ID ,PRODUCT_NAME ,PRODUCT_PRICE ,PRODUCT_INFO ,PRODUCT_CREATED_AT ,PRODUCT_MODIFIED_AT ,PRODUCT_HIT ,PRODUCT_STATE ,PRODUCT_TRADE_ADDRESS ) VALUES ( PRODUCT_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{sellerNo} , NULL , #{categoryDto.categoryId} , #{productName} , #{productPrice} , #{productInfo} , SYSTIMESTAMP , SYSTIMESTAMP , 0 , 1 , #{tradeAddress} )

INSERT INTO PRODUCT_IMAGE ( IMAGE_NO , PRODUCT_NO , PATH , FILESYSTEM_NAME , IMAGE_ORIGINAL_NAME , HAS_THUMBNAIL ) VALUES ( PRODUCT_IMAGE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{productNo}, #{path}, #{filesystemName}, #{imageOriginalName}, #{hasThumbnail} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.PRODUCT_NO, A.SELLER_NO, A.BUYER_NO, A.CATEGORY_ID, A.PRODUCT_NAME, A.PRODUCT_PRICE, A.PRODUCT_INFO, A.PRODUCT_CREATED_AT, A.PRODUCT_MODIFIED_AT, A.PRODUCT_HIT, A.PRODUCT_STATE, A.PRODUCT_TRADE_ADDRESS, A.REVIEW_CONTENTS, A.REVIEW_SCORE, A.CREATED_AT, A.TRADE_AT FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY PRODUCT_NO DESC) AS RN, P.PRODUCT_NO, P.SELLER_NO, P.BUYER_NO, P.CATEGORY_ID, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_PRICE, P.PRODUCT_INFO, P.PRODUCT_CREATED_AT, P.PRODUCT_MODIFIED_AT, P.PRODUCT_HIT, P.PRODUCT_STATE, P.PRODUCT_TRADE_ADDRESS, P.REVIEW_CONTENTS, P.REVIEW_SCORE, P.CREATED_AT, P.TRADE_AT, USR.USER_NO, USR.EMAIL, USR.NAME FROM PRODUCT P LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_T USR ON P.SELLER_NO = USR.USER_NO) A WHERE A.RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}

SELECT P.PRODUCT_NO, P.SELLER_NO, P.BUYER_NO, P.CATEGORY_ID, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_PRICE, P.PRODUCT_INFO, P.PRODUCT_CREATED_AT, P.PRODUCT_MODIFIED_AT, P.PRODUCT_HIT, P.PRODUCT_STATE, P.PRODUCT_TRADE_ADDRESS, P.REVIEW_CONTENTS, P.REVIEW_SCORE, P.CREATED_AT, P.TRADE_AT, USR.USER_NO, USR.EMAIL, USR.NAME, C.NAME FROM USER_T USR RIGHT OUTER JOIN PRODUCT P ON USR.USER_NO = P.SELLER_NO INNER JOIN CATEGORY C ON P.CATEGORY_ID = C.CATEGORY_ID WHERE P.PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo}

SELECT A.PRODUCT_NO, A.SELLER_NO, A.PRODUCT_NAME, A.PRODUCT_PRICE, A.PRODUCT_INFO, A.PRODUCT_CREATED_AT, A.PRODUCT_MODIFIED_AT, A.PRODUCT_HIT, A.PRODUCT_STATE, A.PRODUCT_TRADE_ADDRESS FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY PRODUCT_HIT DESC) AS RN, PRODUCT_NO, SELLER_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_INFO, PRODUCT_CREATED_AT,PRODUCT_MODIFIED_AT, PRODUCT_HIT, PRODUCT_STATE, PRODUCT_TRADE_ADDRESS FROM PRODUCT) A WHERE A.RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}

SELECT PRODUCT_NO, SELLER_NO, BUYER_NO, CATEGORY_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_INFO, PRODUCT_CREATED_AT, PRODUCT_MODIFIED_AT, PRODUCT_HIT, PRODUCT_STATE, PRODUCT_TRADE_ADDRESS, REVIEW_CONTENTS, REVIEW_SCORE, CREATED_AT, TRADE_AT FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY PRODUCT_NO DESC) AS RN, PRODUCT_NO, SELLER_NO, BUYER_NO, CATEGORY_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_INFO, PRODUCT_CREATED_AT, PRODUCT_MODIFIED_AT, PRODUCT_HIT, PRODUCT_STATE, PRODUCT_TRADE_ADDRESS, REVIEW_CONTENTS, REVIEW_SCORE, CREATED_AT, TRADE_AT FROM PRODUCT) A WHERE PRODUCT_TRADE_ADDRESS LIKE '%' || (SELECT INTEREST_SIGUNGU FROM USER_T WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo}) || '%' AND A.RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT_COMMENT( COMMENT_NO , PRODUCT_NO , USER_NO , CONTENTS , CREATED_AT , DEPTH , GROUP_NO , STATUS ) VALUES( PRODUCT_COMMENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{productNo} , #{userNo} , #{contents} , SYSTIMESTAMP , 0 , PRODUCT_COMMENT_SEQ.CURRVAL , 1 )
mapper.select: SELECT A.COMMENT_NO, A.PRODUCT_NO, A.USER_NO, A.CONTENTS, A.CREATED_AT, A.DEPTH, A.GROUP_NO, A.STATUS, A.NAME FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY GROUP_NO DESC, DEPTH ASC, COMMENT_NO DESC) AS RN, P.COMMENT_NO, P.PRODUCT_NO, P.USER_NO, P.CONTENTS, P.CREATED_AT, P.DEPTH, P.GROUP_NO, P.STATUS, U.USER_NO, U.NAME FROM USER_T U INNER JOIN PRODUCT_COMMENT P ON U.USER_NO = P.USER_NO WHERE P.PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo}) A WHERE A.RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}

SELECT A.PRODUCT_NO, A.SELLER_NO, A.PRODUCT_NAME, A.PRODUCT_PRICE, A.PRODUCT_INFO, A.PRODUCT_CREATED_AT, A.PRODUCT_MODIFIED_AT, A.PRODUCT_HIT, A.PRODUCT_STATE, A.PRODUCT_TRADE_ADDRESS FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY PRODUCT_NO DESC) AS RN, PRODUCT_NO, SELLER_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_INFO, PRODUCT_CREATED_AT,PRODUCT_MODIFIED_AT, PRODUCT_HIT, PRODUCT_STATE, PRODUCT_TRADE_ADDRESS FROM PRODUCT) A WHERE A.RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
